title: A Gang Story
plot: After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge Suttel, with whom he first discovered prison life - for stealing cherries. The two of them inevitably got involved in organized crime. The team they formed, the Gang Des Lyonnais, made them the most notorious armed robbers of the early 1970s. Their irresistible rise ended in 1974 with a spectacular arrest. Today, as he nears 60, Momon would like to forget that part of his life. He has found peace by retiring from the "business". He tends to his wife Janou, who suffered so in the past, and to his children and grandchildren, all of whom have great respect for this man of simple and universal values, so clear-headed and full of kindness. But then Serge Suttel, who has disowned nothing of his past, comes back into the picture.
writers: Olivier Marchal, Edgar Marie, Edmond Vidal
stars: Gérard Lanvin, Tchéky Karyo, Daniel Duval, Lionnel Astier

plotShort.plainText:
A Gang Story
A Gang Story (French: Les Lyonnais) is a 2011 French drama film directed by Olivier Marchal.

similars.title: The Last Deadly Mission
similars.plot: A washed-up Marseilles cop (Auteuil) earns a chance at redemption by protecting a woman from the man who killed her parents as he is about to be released from prison.
similars.stars: Daniel Auteuil, Olivia Bonamy, Catherine Marchal

similars.title: 36th Precinct
similars.plot: 2 cops are promised by the retiring chief of the Paris police that the one, getting the violent gang robbing armored trucks, will get his job. The 2 will do whatever it takes to get the promotion, even if it means breaking the law.
similars.stars: Daniel Auteuil, Gérard Depardieu, André Dussollier

similars.title: Carbone
similars.plot: Danger of losing his business, Anthony Roca, an ordinary man, develops a scam that will become the heist of the century. Overtaken by the crime, he will have to deal with betrayal, murder and settling.

similars.title: Borderline
